name: Top Bike Stunt - Bike Extreme
description:
Top Bike Stunt - Bike Extreme Racer Game is specially designed and developed for superheros flying spider homecoming fans and American captain superhero fans. In this best superhero game you can select the superhero of your own choice and race other one. Perform crazy flips, wheelies or back flips to score the highest points in every level. Accelerate your bike to the highest speed, survive without falling off the path and reach the finish line within the shortest time to be the top. Experience the realest physics to drive on insane tracks.

Features:
- Unlock exciting new bikes
- Smooth controls
- Awesome Fantasy Urban Environment
- Realistic Driving Experience
- Realistic motorbike riding physics
- Breathtaking 3D Graphics
- Dynamic camera angles
